name: Unsung Guildies
description:
An adventure with your guild to secure a gateway to the far away mountain of the frost giant tyrant has gone horribly wrong. You are now the sole survivor, he has sent all minions into the village, the forest and the beaches to hunt your guild down to the very last member! 

You are a rogue who can use both axes and magic of her fallen guild mates to secure the portal. Find all the items to unlock the boss at the mountain to avenge your fallen guildies!

___________________________________________________

Controls: 

Right Click - Melee Attack

Left Click-  Spell Attack

WASD - To move

Space - Jump

Shift - Lock on

F - Change target

P - Open Inventory 

O - Close Inventory 

____________________________________________________
